Text:
Legitimate question for sceneline:  Why did you split the RAR up into 11 parts?  Why not 3, or 100, or even 3,792?  Is it becauz teh torrenz can only handle less tanh 50 meglobytes at one timez?  Because I've always wondered how people got around that limitation in the past.

Don't get me wrong, I honestly and truly do appreciate the upload.  As a side benefit I would also greatly appreciate an explanation for something that has been so vexing me these past months.
